definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: I think I need to get this report proofed before I hand it in.
sentences.chinese: 我想在這篇報告交出去之前，我需要校對一下。

sentences.english: Real-word spell checking is a long-existing problem in the natural language processing field.
sentences.chinese: 真詞錯誤拼寫校對是自然語言處理領域中的一個難題。

sentences.english: Added support for spell checking run together words.
sentences.chinese: 增加對聯片詞校對支持。

sentences.english: Our signal and laboratory calibrators are multifunction instruments designed to check and calibrate your test and process equipment.
sentences.chinese: 多功能儀器，用以校對並調整實驗和加工設備。

sentences.english: The proofreader queried the spelling of the word.
sentences.chinese: 校對員對這個詞的拼寫有疑問。

sentences.english: The publisher finished the final edition after proofreading for many times.
sentences.chinese: 校對，出版社終於完成了定本。

sentences.english: Have a spouse or friend proofread your proposal.
sentences.chinese: 讓你的妻子或丈夫，或者朋友幫你校對一遍。

sentences.english: Have you checked these proofs through?
sentences.chinese: 這些校樣你校對過了嗎？

sentences.english: There was, of course, no way could the two colonies have checked  take-off time with each other.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，這兩個蟻羣根本沒有辦法校對彼此的起飛時間。

sentences.english: The Scrolls have revolutionized textual criticism of the Old Testament.
sentences.chinese: 古卷在舊約全書的基礎上徹底做了校對。

sentences.english: It is a pity that they seem to have skipped the copy-editing.
sentences.chinese: 然後遺憾的是他們好像缺少校對。

sentences.english: She has read the editorial through twice.
sentences.chinese: 她把社論已經校對了兩遍了。

sentences.english: If it is a guest article or a linkbait piece, proofread it one more time.
sentences.chinese: 如果是一篇客座博客，更應該多次校對。

sentences.english: At last. the composition and critical techique of Chinese text automatic proofreading system are given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了中文文本自動校對系統的組成及關鍵技術。

sentences.english: Please prepare your message in a punched tape and check it up before transmission.
sentences.chinese: 請把電文作好孔，並校對無誤後再發。

definition: dictionary/also written 詞典|词典[ci2 dian3]/CL:本[ben3],部[bu4]
to translate and edit/translator-editor/(computing) to compile (source code)
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile
to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
